title: New Book Releases
passage_text:
Reading Practice
 
New Book Releases
A   This book describes the creativity of Aboriginal people living in the driest parts of Australia. S
reproductions of paintings, beautiful photography and informative text.
B   Pocket-sized maps and illustrations with detailed information on the nesting sites and migrat
Australia. This is a classic booklet suitable for both beginner and expert.
C   Packed full of information for the avid hiker, this book is a must. Photographs, maps and pra
will guide your journeys on foot through the forests of the southern continent.
D   More than-an atlas - this book contains maps, photographs and an abundance of information
and climate of countries from around the globe.
E   Australia's premier mountain biking guidebook - taking you through a host of national parks a
forests.
F   Here's the A-Z of Australian native animals - take an in-depth look at their lives and characte
fantastic photographs and informative text.
G   Graphic artists have worked with researchers and scientists to illustrate how these prehistori
and died on the Australian continent.
H   A definitive handbook on outdoor safety - with a specific focus on equipment, nutrition, first a
clothing and bush skills.
I   Detailed guides to 15 scenic car tours that will take you onto fascinating wilderness tracks and
that you could otherwise have missed.
 
1
questions_text:
Questions 1-7
The list of New Book Releases on the following page has nine book descriptions A-I.
 
 
 
 
Choose the correct title for each book from the list of book titles below.
Write the correct number i-xi in boxes 8-14 on your answer sheet.
List of Book Titles
i
Field Guide to Native Birds of Australia
ii
The Bush on Two Wheels: 100 Top Rides
iii
Bush Foods of Australian Aborigines
iv
A Pictorial History of the Dinosaur in Australia
v
Bushwalking in Australia
vi
World Geographica
vii
Driving Adventures for 4-wheel-drive Vehicles
viii
Survival Techniques in the Wild
ix
Encyclopaedia of Australian Wildlife
x
Guide to the Art of the Australian Desert
xi
 
Field Guide to Animals of the World
 
 
 
8
9
10

Book B 2.....................
Book C 3.....................

Reading Practice
 
New Book Releases
A   This book describes the creativity of Aboriginal people living in the driest parts of Australia. S
reproductions of paintings, beautiful photography and informative text.
B   Pocket-sized maps and illustrations with detailed information on the nesting sites and migrat
Australia. This is a classic booklet suitable for both beginner and expert.
C   Packed full of information for the avid hiker, this book is a must. Photographs, maps and pra
will guide your journeys on foot through the forests of the southern continent.
D   More than-an atlas - this book contains maps, photographs and an abundance of information
and climate of countries from around the globe.
E   Australia's premier mountain biking guidebook - taking you through a host of national parks a
forests.

fantastic photographs and informative text.

and died on the Australian continent.

clothing and bush skills.

that you could otherwise have missed.
 
1
